message:
SYSTEM: SparqlDQPGrupo.pdf: Página 25
Partitioner
• Partitions the SparqlLQP in the available nodes
• OGSA-DQP knows all the nodes
• IP
• Resources in the node
• The partitioner is included in the optimisers chain
• OGSA-DQP knowing the LQP and the nodes creates 
an execution plan which is distributed across these 
nodes
• Important:
• OGSA-DQP for SQL has a dictionary with the SQL database 
statistics
• For SPARQL there are missing key statistics for improving 
the optimisations
speaker: SYSTEM
